title: Biden requests $33 billion for Ukraine war; Putin threatens 'lightning fast' retaliation to nations that intervene - CNBC
content:
1. Biden requests $33 billion for Ukraine war; Putin threatens 'lightning fast' retaliation to nations that intervene  CNBC
  2. Biden asks Congress for $33 billion in aid to Ukraine as war enters new phase  CNN
  3. Ukraine-Russia War News: Biden Asks Congress for $33 Billion More in Aid  The New York Times
  4. Opinion | If Russia starts winning, Americans won't blame Ukraine. They'll blame Biden.  The Washington Post
  5. Biden asks Congress for $33 billion in Ukraine aid to ramp up pressure on Russia  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russia's President Vladimir Putin has warned the West of a "lightning fast" response to any country intervening in the war in Ukraine.
